name: School Shooter
description:
Meet Tyler. Tyler is a normal guy who was bullied a lot. So he decided to attack his school with illegal guns. But the Military is there defending the school. Will Tyler win?

CONTROLS: 

Character control: WASD

Jump: Space

Crouch: C

Peek left: Q

Peek right: E

Reload: R

Sprint: WASD+Shift

Open doors/Use action: Enter

Weapon toggle: 1-9
